com.SCHSRobotics.HAL9001.util.math

Class EncoderToDistanceProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SCHSRobotics.HAL9001.util.math.EncoderToDistanceProcessor

  • public class EncoderToDistanceProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    A calculator that calculates encoder ticks per meter and uses that to find.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0 Creation Date: 7/19/19
    Author:
    Dylan Zueck, Crow Force

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EncoderToDistanceProcessor(double encoderPerMeter)
      Constructor that uses encoderPerMeter given by calibration program.
      EncoderToDistanceProcessor(double diameter, int encoderPerRotation, Units unit)
      Constructor that sets theoretical encoderPerMeter using given encoderPerRotation(less accurate).
      EncoderToDistanceProcessor(double diameter, Units unit)
      Constructor that sets theoretical encoderPerMeter using default encoderPerRotation(less accurate).

                                  int encoderPerRotation,
                                  Units unit)

        Parameters:
        diameter - Diameter of wheel.
        encoderPerRotation - number of encoders per one rotation of the wheel.
        unit - Units of the diameter.
